items.title: Are Short-Course Corticosteroids Safe for Children?
items.description: Short-course systemic corticosteroids in children and adolescents were associated with adverse events that were rarely serious. Medscape Medical News

items.title: Biologics May Promote Structural Lung Changes in COPD
items.description: New data suggest a link between long-term biologics use and airway wall thickness, as well as emphysema. Medscape Medical News
